name: NASA: Prototype Fluid System
description: Autonomous Systems Lab; AA04	Prototype Fluid System	Creating prototype fluid system with sensor and actuator interfaces to data acquisition & control system and G2/NPAS Digital Twin. Rationale: (1) Creates laboratory hardware system useful for demos; (2) Implementing a model system supports G2/NPAS training by providing actual hardware elements; (3) Building a simple fluid system lays groundwork for developing a more advanced ACM fluid system. 	Prototyping & Fabrication; Testing/Data Acquisition
